module.name: ap203_configuration_controlled_3d_design_of_mechanical_parts_and_assemblies
module.name.french: pièces et assemblages pour la gestion de configuration 3D relatif à l'AP 203
module.keywords: module, 3D design, assemblies, product structure, tolerances

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the product definitions with three-dimensional shape representations and the data which defines and controls the configuration of these product definitions for the design life cycle.
The second edition of this part of ISO 10303 incorporated the modifications to the first edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications were added:
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications were modified:
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications were removed:
In addition, modifications were made to the mapping specification, the MIM schema and the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.
The third edition of this part of ISO 10303 incorporates the modifications to the second edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications were added:
In addition, modifications were made to the MIM schema and the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.
This fourth edition of this part of ISO 10303 incorporates the modifications to the third edition listed below.
The following modifications were made to the mapping specification:
In addition, modifications were made to the EXPRESS-G diagrams.

inscope.li: products that are mechanical parts and assemblies;
product definition data and configuration control data pertaining to the design phase of a product's development;
representation of an instance of a part in an assembly through its usage in a sub-assembly;
geometric validation properties to allow the translation of geometric shape representations (advanced boundary representation and faceted boundary representation solids) to be checked for quality;
geometric and dimensional tolerances applied to geometric shape representations;
materials and their composition of chemical substance;
catalogue data characterized by property value pairs;
technical drawings as two dimensional presentation of product data.

outscope.li: product definition data pertaining to any life cycle phase other than design;
configuration control data pertaining to any life cycle phase other than design.

uof.name: Ap203e2_config_control_3d_design_module
uof.description: This UoF is intended to represent the entire data structures of this application protocol module. It enables the management of product data associated with mechanical parts and assemblies through the design life cycle, including several kinds of of shape representations.
